applicationDetails: HIRING INTEGRATORS! Let's help people get involve
title: Integrator
shortDescription: HR is looking for people who will help new and existing members get involve in the project and push them to become Founding Members! Devoting at least 24 hrs a week is needed for this role. Knowledge of the project is needed, though for newcomers the lead is willing to train you. Fast responsiveness in Discord is A MUST when welcoming new comers.

applicationFormQuestions.question: What is your timezone? Please give me the days and time you can be available for this role.
What language/s do you speak and write? And level?
When did you join Joystream? How would you describe your knowledge about the project?
Tell me something about yourself and why would you be a good fit for this position.
